ygData.subject: Re: NPCs selling lambent stones (was Lambent Stones on  E'ci)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... One place you could try is the gypsy camp in Oasis. I ve been hunting SG s there for a while with my druid and if there s no bards around I usually just
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Dec 10/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:
> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> I auctioned for a stone last night and someone told me that I could get one
> from a merchant in Erudin (hehe I was in EK heading for Lava - not really
> into a boat ride) but does the merchant have an inventory of them or was it
> just an item some player sold to the merch?

One place you could try is the gypsy camp in Oasis. I've been hunting
SG's there for a while with my druid and if there's no bards around I
usually just sell the stones to the gypsy vendor.
